verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him,

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal:<s%>

And I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> you <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> into your <S%H3895>jaws,<s%> and I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2428>army,<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4358>sorts<s%> of armor, even a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> with <S%H6793>bucklers<s%> and <S%H4043>shields,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H8610>handling<s%> <S%H2719>swords:<s%>
<S%H6539>Persia,<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> and <S%H6316>Libya<s%> with them; <S%H3605>all<s%> of them with <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H3553>helmet:<s%>

<S%H1586>Gomer,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>bands;<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>quarters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>bands:<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with you.

Be you <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> for yourself, you, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>company<s%> that are <S%H6950>assembled<s%> to you, and be you a <S%H4929>guard<s%> to them.

After <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall be <S%H6485>visited:<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and is <S%H6908>gathered<s%> out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H2723>waste:<s%> but it is <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them.

You shall <S%H5927>ascend<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> like a <S%H7722>storm,<s%> you shall be like a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> you, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H102>bands,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with you.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> It shall also <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that at the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> shall <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> your <S%H3824>mind,<s%> and you shall <S%H2803>think<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4284>thought:<s%>

And you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> I will <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H776>land<s%> of unwalled <S%H6519>villages;<s%> I will <S%H935>go<s%> to them that are at <S%H8252>rest,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and having <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> nor <S%H1817>gates,<s%>

To <S%H962>take<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and to <S%H962>take<s%> a <S%H957>prey;<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H2723>desolate<s%> places that are now <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and on the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are <S%H622>gathered<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> which have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2872>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan,<s%> and the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions<s%> thereof, shall <S%H559>say<s%> to you, Are you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7997>take<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil?<s%> have you <S%H6950>gathered<s%> your <S%H6951>company<s%> to <S%H962>take<s%> a <S%H957>prey?<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> away <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> away <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods,<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil?<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> In that <S%H3117>day<s%> when my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwells<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> shall you not <S%H3045>know<s%> it?

And you shall <S%H935>come<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>parts,<s%> you, and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with you, <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>company,<s%> and a <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army:<s%>

And you shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> it shall be in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H776>land,<s%> that the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> me, when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you, O <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Are you he of <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H6931>old<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> by my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> many <S%H8141>years<s%> that I would <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H5921>against<s%> them?

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass at the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> that my <S%H2534>fury<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up in my <S%H639>face.<s%>

For in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>shaking<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

So that the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> things that <S%H7430>creep<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> that are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H2040>thrown<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> and the <S%H4095>steep<s%> places shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be against his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And I will <S%H8199>plead<s%> against him with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and with <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and I will <S%H4305>rain<s%> on him, and on his <S%H102>bands,<s%> and on the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with him, an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> and <S%H417>great<s%> <S%H68>hailstones,<s%> <S%H417><s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H1614>brimstone.<s%>

Thus will I <S%H1431>magnify<s%> myself, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> myself; and I will be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
